Package git7s.flashcardai

Class User

java.lang.Object
git7s.flashcardai.User
public class User extends Object
A simple Model Class that represents a user.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(int id, String password, String firstName, String lastName, boolean admin)
      User Constructor - creates a new user with the following params:
      Parameters:
      id - The userID (studentID) UNIQUE
      password - The user's password (unhashed)
      firstName - The user's firstname
      lastName - The user's lastname
      admin - The user's priv level Then the constructor hashes the password
